channel.title: Tb cycle ad bug
channel.description: hello people! i found a bug in the "cycle ad" module by tb in the community library. the inlets for modulating attack and decay are disconnected from the actual parameters. i corrected it because i needed the module in a patch and here's my corrected version: cyclingADmod.axo (1.5 KB)

item.title: Tb cycle ad bug
item.dc:creator: @hyena giona vinti
item.description:
@hyena wrote:

hello people!
i found a bug in the "cycle ad" module by tb in the community library.
the inlets for modulating attack and decay are disconnected from the actual parameters.
i corrected it because i needed the module in a patch and here's my corrected version:
cyclingADmod.axo (1.5 KB)

Read full topic
